attributes.action: Improve security checks for train travel
attributes.additional_details: There have been many incidents and there isn’t any secure way to ensure that passengers are safe or that passengers don’t bring weapons on them.
attributes.background: Install more security measures such as metal detectors or checks or other ways to ensure the safety of passengers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Require metal detectors and bag and ID checks at all mainline railway stations" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749049
